source.package: * Basic .au and .snd audio handler. * @author Jeff Nisewanger */ package sun.net.www.content.audio
source.javadoc:
Basic .au and .snd audio handler.
Jeff Nisewanger

class.name: basic
class.javadoc: Returns an AppletAudioClip object. This provides backwards compatibility with the behavior of ClassLoader.getResource().getContent() on JDK1.1.
